title: New Champion: Mavrik and Marvel, the Dubious Duo
body:
Mavrik & Marvel, the Dubious Duo
Mavrik, the adventure seeking Yordle found Marvel near death and nurtured him back to life.
Marvel, in return the giant jungle troll never leaves Mavriks side and allows for him to live on his shoulders (a bit of a Nunu set up going on here)

**Passive (Leave a Trail)**:Every time an ability is cast, Marvel drops a land mine that deals damage and slows the champion or minion that stepped on it

**Q (Tracer Bullet): 	**

**First Activation**: Mavrik fires a tracer shot into a target.

**Before reactivation/stack building phase**: auto-attacking any target will build up stacks (maximum of 2)

**Reactivation**: the built-up stacks are fired into the air and home into (like a homing missile) the previously marked target. The damage dealt is worth 1 AA per stack and can critical strike. In addition, the tracer is consumed burning the target for a percentage of their HP over time.

**W (Running Start):** 	Marvel hold out his arm giving Mavrik a platform for him to run along, gaining speed to throw grenade at a targeted location.

**E (Hold on tight):** 	Marvel leaps to a new location a short distance away

**R(Machine Gun Mode) = MGM:
**
Marvel unstraps the machine gun that is on his back and holds it at shoulder height whilst, Mavrik, perched on his shoulder fires away. During this period Mavrik cannot target select but shoots at the closest target available and gains the “tracer bullet” burn effect every third shot and proc’ing passive. In addition, the duo can attack whilst moving (like Syndras casting) but have reduced movement speed. 

Note: Other abilities cannot be used whilst MGM is being channeled.
	
**Summary of R:**
	-Attack the closest target but with the advantage of additional AD and AS
	-Attack whilst moving but at the cost of lower MS
	-Third shot burn effect (% hp over time) and proc’ing passive (leave a trail).

**Strengths** are in taking down tanks with low hard engage and in prolonged team fights

**Weakness** are CC and burst damage

Thanks for reading,

Gekko
